getFieldMinimumValue

public static Object getFieldMinimumValue(com.psddev.dari.db.ObjectField field)
Retrieve the field's minimum value for Production Guide display. For these purposes, we suppress some of the "less-useful" max/min values as they can be confusing to the editors

getFieldMaximumValue

public static Object getFieldMaximumValue(com.psddev.dari.db.ObjectField field)
Retrieve the field's maximum value for Production Guide display. For these purposes, we suppress some of the "less-useful" max/min values as they can be confusing to the editors

Query to get a T/F as to whether the given fieldName has any information we include in the field description (e.g. used to determine whether ? link is displayed in UI

findOrCreateGuide

public static GuideType findOrCreateGuide(com.psddev.dari.db.ObjectType documentedType)

createGuide

public static GuideType createGuide(com.psddev.dari.db.ObjectType documentedType)
Create a GuideType instance for the given documentedType. To allow for thread/transaction safety, this is synchronized first queries to ensure it hasn't already been created.
